title: The Parade
subtle: Concept (fiction), 25 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: The Parade introduces students to the exciting things that can be seen at a Fourth of July parade. Vibrant illustrations, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the main idea and supporting details.
meta: balloons, clowns, drums, flags, hats, horses, parade
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /h/ sound
High-Frequency Words : High frequency words I, see, the

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
